product_name: Aloe Gator Water-Resistant Sunblock - SPF 40 - 3 oz.
long_description: This Aloe Gator Water-Resistant SPF 40 Sunblock lasts up to 80 min. no matter how much you swim or play. SPF 40; provides both UVA and UVB protection. Invisible and non greasy. Contains no PABA so it won't burn eyes. Moisturizes as it protects.
short_description: This Aloe Gator Water-Resistant SPF 40 Sunblock lasts up to 80 min. no matter how much you swim or play.
